FuncDef: This command creates a mapping between the LSP EXP bits of the network ingress traffic and the forwarding class.

ParaDef.Info: Specify the LSP EXP values to be associated with the forwarding class. Values-0 to 8 (Decimal representation of three EXP bit field).
Enter this required parameter to specify the fc-name that the EXP bit pattern will be associated with. Values-be, l2, af, l1, h2, ef, h1, nc.
Enter this required parameter to indicate whether the LSP EXP value is the in-profile or out-of-profile value. Values-in, out.
